`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const obj1 = {
  name: "\u6797\u4E09\u5FC3",
  sayName: function () {
    console.log(this.name);
  },
};
const obj2 = {
  name: "Sunshin_Lin",
};
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
obj1.sayName.call(obj2); // Sunshin_Lin
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
obj1.sayName.apply(obj2); // Sunshin_Lin
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
const fn = obj1.sayName.bind(obj2);
fn(); // Sunshin_Lin

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u5B9A\u4E49\u4E00\u4E2A\u52A8\u7269\u7C7B
function Animal(name) {
  // \u5C5E\u6027
  this.name = name || "Animal";
  // \u5B9E\u4F8B\u65B9\u6CD5
  this.sleep = function () {
    console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01");
  };
}
// \u539F\u578B\u65B9\u6CD5
Animal.prototype.eat = function (food) {
  console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u5403\uFF1A" + food);
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat() {}
Cat.prototype = new Animal();
Cat.prototype.name = "cat";

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // cat
cat.eat("fish"); // cat\u6B63\u5728\u5403\uFF1Afish
cat.sleep(); // cat\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); //true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); //true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  var instance = new Animal();
  instance.name = name || "Tom";
  return instance;
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // false

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  var animal = new Animal();
  for (var p in animal) {
    Cat.prototype[p] = animal[p];
  }
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // false
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}
Cat.prototype = new Animal();

Cat.prototype.constructor = Cat;

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}
// \u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u6CA1\u6709\u5B9E\u4F8B\u65B9\u6CD5\u7684\u7C7B
var Super = function () {};
Super.prototype = Animal.prototype;
//\u5C06\u5B9E\u4F8B\u4F5C\u4E3A\u5B50\u7C7B\u7684\u539F\u578B
Cat.prototype = new Super();

// Test Code
var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); //true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// Currying\u540E
function curryingAdd(x) {
    return function (y) {
        return x + y
    }
}

add(1, 2)           // 3
curryingAdd(1)(2)   // 3

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u6B63\u5E38\u6B63\u5219\u9A8C\u8BC1\u5B57\u7B26\u4E32 reg.test(txt)

// \u666E\u901A\u60C5\u51B5
function check(reg, txt) {
    return reg.test(txt)
}

check(/\\d+/g, 'test')       //false
check(/[a-z]+/g, 'test')    //true

// Currying\u540E
function curryingCheck(reg) {
    return function(txt) {
        return reg.test(txt)
    }
}

var hasNumber = curryingCheck(/\\d+/g)
var hasLetter = curryingCheck(/[a-z]+/g)

hasNumber('test1')      // true
hasNumber('testtest')   // false
hasLetter('21212')      // false

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function sayKey(key) {
  console.log(this[key])
}
const person = {
  name: 'Sunshine_Lin',
  age: 23
}
// call\u4E0D\u662F\u79D1\u91CC\u5316
sayKey.call(person, 'name') // \u7ACB\u5373\u8F93\u51FA Sunshine_Lin
sayKey.call(person, 'age') // \u7ACB\u5373\u8F93\u51FA 23

// bind\u662F\u79D1\u91CC\u5316
const say = sayKey.bind(person) // \u4E0D\u6267\u884C
// \u60F3\u6267\u884C\u518D\u6267\u884C

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const space = (str) => str.split(' ')
const len = (arr) => arr.length


// \u666E\u901A\u5199\u6CD5
console.log(len(space('i am linsanxin'))) // 3
console.log(len(space('i am 23 year old'))) // 5
console.log(len(space('i am a author in juejin'))) // 6


// compose\u5199\u6CD5
const compose = (...fn) => value => {
  return fn.reduce((value, fn) => {
    return fn(value)
  }, value)
}
const computedWord = compose(space, len)
console.log(computedWord('i am linsanxin')) // 3
console.log(computedWord('i am 23 year old')) // 5
console.log(computedWord('i am a author in juejin')) // 6
